title: New Orleans truck attack: Joe Biden says FBI found ISIS-inspired Shamsud-Din Jabbar posted videos hours before rampage - Hindustan Times
summary:
ISIS-Inspired Attack in New Orleans: President Biden Condemns Rampage, FBI Investigates

Date & Source: January 1, 2025, Hindustan Times

Introduction: A truck attack in New Orleans on New Year's Eve left at least 15 people dead and dozens injured, with the FBI linking the suspect to ISIS-inspiration.

  1. US Army veteran Shamsud-Din Jabbar, inspired by ISIS, drove a pickup truck into a crowd on Bourbon Street.
  2. Jabbar posted videos hours before the attack, expressing his desire to kill.
  3. President Joe Biden condemned the attack, offered condolences, and assured the public that the FBI is investigating.
  4. The truck attack turned festive Bourbon Street into a macabre mayhem of maimed victims and fleeing pedestrians.
  5. The FBI believes Jabbar was not solely responsible and is investigating potential associates and explosives found at the scene.

“This is not just an act of terrorism. This is evil.” - New Orleans Police superintendent Anne Kirkpatrick

Conclusion: The FBI is actively investigating the New Orleans truck attack, treating it as an act of terrorism, with President Biden offering condolences to the victims and their families.
newTitle: ISIS-Inspired Attack in New Orleans: President Biden Condemns Rampage, FBI Investigates

title: Jennifer Garner’s family 'wants' her back with ex Ben Affleck especially after… - Hindustan Times
summary:
Jennifer Garner's Family Hopes for Reunion with Ex-Husband Ben Affleck

Published on: Jan 02, 2025 06:57 AM IST

Jennifer Garner's family is rooting for a reunion between the actress and her ex-husband Ben Affleck, as the former couple has been spending quality time together with their children, including during holidays. While Garner maintains a relationship with her current beau, John Miller, her family believes there's still chemistry between her and Affleck.

Garner and Affleck, who share three children, have been spotted together recently, fueling speculation about a possible reconciliation. The 'Gone Girl' star is currently going through a high-profile divorce from Jennifer Lopez.

  1. Garner's family is hoping for a reunion.The former couple has been spending more time together.Affleck's friends and family are supportive of a reunion.Garner's current partner, John Miller, may feel like a 'third wheel.'
"Ben is laying it on thick, he’s giving Jen so much of himself and his attention and being so charming," a source told In Touch. "It’s very hard not to love him when he’s acting this way, and a lot of people are predicting that they could end up back together."

While there's no confirmation of a reunion, Garner's family and friends are optimistic about the possibility of the former couple getting back together.
newTitle: Jennifer Garner's Family Hopes for Reunion with Ex-Husband Ben Affleck

title: Norovirus cases surge in USA: 5 key things you need to know - The Times of India
summary:
Norovirus Cases Surge in the USA: 5 Key Things to Know

Publication Date: December 5, 2023

Source: US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

Cases of norovirus, a highly contagious stomach bug, are surging in the USA, prompting health officials to underline the importance of preventive measures.

  • During the week of December 5, 91 norovirus outbreaks were reported, up from 69 the previous week.
  • This increase marks a significant rise as the previous years had a maximum of 65 cases at this time.
  • Norovirus is the leading cause of foodborne illness, responsible for 58% of such infections annually in the USA.
  • It spreads through contaminated food, water, surfaces, or close contact with infected individuals.
  • Young children, older adults, and those with weakened immune systems are at higher risk of infection.
“Norovirus is highly contagious, so prevention is key.”

Health officials stress the importance of hygiene and preventive measures to reduce infection rates, especially during peak seasons.
newTitle: Norovirus Cases Surge in the USA: 5 Key Things to Know

title: Five amazing images of Nebula captured by NASA Hubble Telescope - India.com
summary:
Five Amazing Images of Nebula Captured by NASA Hubble Telescope

Date & Source: January 01, 2025, India.com

The NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope has provided us with a stunning collection of nebula images. These nebulae, located in distant galaxies, offer a glimpse into the cosmos.

  1. Veil Nebula: A small section of the Veil Nebula observed by Hubble.
  2. Eagle Nebula: A billowing tower of cold gas and dust rising from a stellar nursery in the Eagle Nebula.
  3. NGC 1501: A complex planetary nebula located in the constellation of Camelopardalis, showcased in a new image from Hubble's Wide Field Planetary Camera 2.
  4. Iris Nebula: A close-up of an area in the northwest region of the large Iris Nebula, clogged with cosmic dust.
  5. Lagoon Nebula: A colorful image of the Lagoon Nebula, captured to celebrate Hubble's 28th anniversary in space.
newTitle: Amazing Nebula Images Captured by Hubble

title: Struggling to lose weight? It's time to rethink what you drink - The Times of India
summary:
Title: Struggling to lose weight? It's time to rethink what you drink

Date & Source: January 3, 2023, The Times of India

As the holiday season winds down, many of us are looking to shed the extra pounds gained from festive feasts and drinks. However, before you start counting calories, consider what you're drinking. One glass of sugary soda or beverage could be hindering your weight loss goals.

  1. Sugar drinks, or sugar-sweetened beverages (SSBs), are leading sources of added sugars in the American diet.
  2. Calories in sugary drinks are often overlooked but can be significant. For example, a 12-ounce can of soda contains 151 calories and 39 grams of sugar.
  3. Consuming sugary drinks is linked to weight gain, obesity, type 2 diabetes, and other health issues. The body doesn't register liquid calories as it does solid ones, leading to overeating.
  4. To avoid sugary drinks, replace them with unsweetened sparkling water, eat fruits instead of fruit juice, and make homemade drinks with natural sweeteners.
"Drinking sugary beverages is linked with weight gain, obesity, type 2 diabetes, heart disease, and other health issues." - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

Conclusion: Paying attention to the sugary drinks we consume can help us better manage our weight and overall health.
newTitle: The Hidden Calories in Sugary Drinks

title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Day 27: Only 100 Crores Away From Baahubali 2, Will Allu Arjun’s Film Rewrite History? - Koimoi
summary:

The action thriller Pushpa 2 is experiencing an exceptional run at the box office, nearing the 1700 crore mark after 27 days. The film features Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil and is set to potentially rewrite history by competing with Baahubali 2.

Key Points:

  • The film earned 8.55 crores net on day 27, making the domestic total reach 1195.20 crores net.
  • Pushpa 2's global total currently stands at 1699.58 crores.
  • It is just 100 crores away from surpassing Baahubali 2's lifetime earnings of 1800 crores.
  • Pushpa 2 may become the first Indian film to cross the 1200 crore net mark.

With an impressive box office performance, it appears that Pushpa 2 may join the ranks of the highest-grossing Indian films, with its final earnings to be influenced by the post-holiday momentum.

title: Climbing stairs is as effective as walking 10,000 steps, says new study - The Times of India
summary:
Climbing Stairs is as Effective as Walking 10,000 Steps, Says New Study

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: Atherosclerosis Journal

A recent study with 450,000 adults reveals that climbing stairs is as effective as achieving the commonly recommended goal of walking 10,000 steps a day. This method offers significant health benefits, particularly in cardiovascular health.

  • Climbing just 5 flights of stairs daily can reduce cardiovascular risks by 20%.
  • Climbing stairs provides a high-calorie burn compared to walking on flat surfaces.
  • This exercise strengthens multiple muscle groups including quads, hamstrings, and core.
  • Elevates heart rate quickly, providing a perfect cardio workout.
“Climbing the stairs is a more effective alternative when time is limited.”

This study highlights the advantages of stair climbing as a viable substitute for walking, especially for those with limited time for exercise.
newTitle: Climbing Stairs is as Effective as Walking 10,000 Steps, Says New Study

title: Engineering student nabbed for killing parents over academic, career dispute - Hindustan Times
summary:
Engineering Student Murders Parents Over Academic Dispute

Publication Date: Jan 01, 2025 11:12 PM IST

An engineering student in Maharashtra's Nagpur allegedly killed his parents over differences regarding his academic record and career, news agency PTI reported. The 25-year-old accused, Utkarsh Dhakhole, killed his parents at their residence in Kapil Nagar area on December 26. He also hid their bodies and told his relatives that his parents had gone to Bengaluru to take part in a meditation programme. Days later, Dhakole's neighbours complained to the police of a foul smell in the neighbourhood, leading to the discovery of the bodies and his arrest.

Key Points:

  • The victim's parents wanted him to quit engineering due to his poor academic record.
  • Utkarsh allegedly strangled his mother and stabbed his father to death.
  • He confessed to the crime during police investigation.

Notable Quote:

“Utkarsh failed to clear several subjects during his engineering course. His parents, therefore, wanted him to quit engineering and choose something else. However, he was against their suggestion,” the official added.

Conclusion:

The incident serves as a grim reminder of the pressure students face regarding academic expectations and career choices, often leading to tragic consequences.
newTitle: Engineering Student Murders Parents Over Academic Dispute

Poco unveils teasers for X7 5G series ahead of Jan 9 launch in India: What all to expect | Mint - Mint
summary:
Poco unveils teasers for X7 5G series ahead of Jan 9 launch in India: What all to expect

Publication Date: Not Available | Source: Live Mint

Poco is set to launch its latest X7 5G series in India on January 9, with two variants on offer: the Poco X7 5G and the Poco X7 Pro 5G. The new smartphones will be sold exclusively on Flipkart, showcasing exciting designs and features through social media teasers.

  • The Poco X7 5G features a centrally-placed squircle camera module, while the X7 Pro 5G has a pill-shaped camera island.
  • Expected color schemes include Poco's signature black and yellow, and dual-tone options for the Pro model.
  • Camera capabilities highlight a 50MP main sensor for both variants, with the Pro utilizing a Sony IMX882 sensor and a 20MP front camera for selfies.
  • The X7 Pro 5G will be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset while the X7 5G is likely to use the Dimensity 7300-Ultra SoC.
  • Battery capacities include 6,000mAh with 90W fast charging for the Pro model and 5,110mAh with 45W charging for the base model.
  • The displays feature a 6.67-inch AMOLED 1.5K display with a 120Hz refresh rate and Gorilla Glass protection.
newTitle: Poco Prepares to Launch X7 5G Series in India on January 9
